content: crocheted drops easter basket in muskat and glitter drops extra 0-509 materials drops muskat from garnstudio 50 g colour no 30 yellow or 50 g colour no 05 light purple and use drops glitter from garnstudio 2 spools nr 01 gold *yardage does not include glitter as it is a thread * drops crochet hook size 3 mm \ us c or the size needed to obtain 22 single_crochet x 24 rounds with 1 thread muskat and 2 threads glitter = 4 x 4 crochet with 1 strand muskat and 2 strands glitter uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3644&cid=19
